alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Hamilton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 8:08PM EDT until August 03 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN HAMILTON AND NORTHWESTERN FULTON COUNTIES... At 807 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Stratford, or 20 miles northeast of Little Falls, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Arietta, Oregon, Knappville, Shaker Place, Powley Place, Clockmill Corners and Averys Place. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
